channel.title: Ny Tech on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Ny Tech on C'est la Z

item.title: No Amazon HQ2 in NYC
item.description: That was the big tech news today. I know there was a good deal of vocal outrage about the deal but to be honest I was pretty surprised by the news. Normally deals like these get steamrolled through for better or worse. I have decidedly mixed feelings about this. On the one hand, I have no problem with Amazon - I've got a bunch of former students working there. Mostly in Seattle but at least one in NYC.
